text:
Hello Guys,
Is there any way to display an error message, for a particular form field based on Jquery?
`success: function(reponse){`
		`var r = JSON.parse(reponse);`
		`if(r.status==200){`
           `alert('Valid')  // other than alert ?`
			`// ('#code-a8b3b4aa-605f-49ed-aafa-5f1bf0b3f110',$form).append("Code is valid");  ?` 						
		`}`
Nice, I will take a look - cheers <@U2H3TT8F2>
